title: Troll Page 'Presstitutes' Posts Photoshopped Tweet Of Mirror Now TV Anchor
subtitle: Facebook page The Presstitute resorts to photoshop to target Mirror Now anchor Faye D'Souza. Deletes post when the bluff is called out.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim: Wow! This is a new low! These jerks have gotten smart enough to write "fictional tweet" at the bottom to avoid legal trouble! #Trolls i obviously didn't tweet this pic.twitter.com/e1BdigojJs
